title: Nicole’s Gotta See 111 Species of Lemurs
description:
This week Nicole buys Sasheer hot dog eating shorts in real time on the podcast. Then Nicole and Sasheer manifest their next career dreams, and Sasheer realizes she has opening weekend audience energy but always sees a movie after it’s been out for a few weeks. These two best friends continue to plan their trip to Africa which includes Nicole needing to see 111 species of lemurs. Then Nicole and Sasheer answer some fan questions which include staying in touch with friends while working as a driver, picking out furniture for a therapy office and some Delta Airlines gossip. So don’t be a CC, and enjoy this episode!

 

Check Out Fashion Brand Company: https://www.fashionbrandcompany.com/

 

Email or call Nicole & Sasheer with your friendship questions at:

nicoleandsasheer@gmail.com

424-645-7003
